channel.title: [Hyperion] New Client
channel.description: I am using the original Hyperion base, I use the moparscape client with it. I have a 317 deob client, but I can't get it to work because I keep getting the [code] Invalid login block opcode : [/code] Thing, how would I set up my client to work just like the Moparscape one?
